STATE v. COOPER. No. COA05-1296. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed July 5, 2006. Certification Date July 25, 2006. Appeal from Gaston (03CRS55035, 02CRS54985).

Case without published opinion. Case No. 02CRS54985-Affirmed. Case No. 03CRS55035-Affirmed; remanded for correction of judgment.
